titleStmt.title: A Christian exercise, containing an easie entrance into the principles of religion and the chiefest points of our saluation in Christe, with a direction for all Christians, into the true seruice of God. By VV. Horne.
titleStmt.author: Horne, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert VValde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre, neere vnto Somerset house,
